Posts.Content: 4kkz wrote: Anyone BRCA 1 or 2 have this before age 45? Or, at all?  (ovary removal) Peace, Sarah...."Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle." Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: oophorectomy 4kkz awb

Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2008 10:38PM 4kkz wrote: Thanks ladies... I got my results back today and are also +   For some reason I was really surprised. I don't know why. My dh is a mathematician and I guess the stats of how rare this is..well.... Now, I will deff be surprised if my cousins comes back neg. she is the one w/the mom who had it the youngest.  I'm distraught, but I guess doing ok. Hubby met me in park w/my daughter while our son was in the museum for art class. We will talk more tonite when kids in bed. I guess I should be glad to know I have it cos now being procative w/MRI's, and mams twice/yr will be covered by my insurance. ugh..what a yucky day..now all I need is for AF to show as is due too..
Posts.Title: waiting on BRCA test 4kkz katharine

Posts.Content: 4kkz wrote: Ok, have a week to go..  I'm 'new' here, but not to breast cancer. You see, I lost my own mom in '96, she was almost 48yrs.  My aunt died at 52 but had cancer at 38 for first time..went twelve yrs w/o it coming back. So, I'm 32 and had 3 children.. One died when two to a drowning.  My sister is 37 and has no children. she had the gene test done and tested + for mutation of the BRCA1 gene.  I got tested that day and still waiting another week. She has decided to wait a yr cos this yr is busy for her...various things...and then wants the double masectomy and ovaries removed. Mind you, she has PCOS and has been on birth control since age 18 and has had abnormal paps and cysts. I know that if I 'm + as well, that I really just want another baby. Is that crazy of me?? I've been healthy, no abnormal paps...only been on birth control pills a few mos once. Had 3 kids, tried to breast feed. but.. ok..if the gene mutation is there all of those things are obsolete, right? nature/nurture means nothing...when battling genes. Anyway...sis sees 1st surgeon friday. should she get a 2nd opinion about removals? if so..whom to rec... ? were thinking of john hopkins or maybe just going to b'ham al... oh, we are in huntsville/alabama... our hosp is pretty high tech actually to those not educated about here. thanks for any response sar Peace, Sarah...."Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle."
